price: 78. Mpe Allah nde oyo abimisaka bino o kati ya mabumu ya bamama ba bino boyebi eloko te, mpe atiyeli bino boyoki na bomoni na mitema mpo bokoka kotondo.
arabic: وَٱللَّهُ أَخۡرَجَكُم مِّنۢ بُطُونِ أُمَّهَٰتِكُمۡ لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ شَيۡـٔٗا وَجَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمۡعَ وَٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرَ وَٱلۡأَفۡـِٔدَةَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wal-lahu akhrajakum min buṭūni ummahātikum lā taʿlamūna shayan wajaʿala lakumu al-samʿa wal-abṣāra wal-afidata laʿallakum tashkurūna
